HOME.TITLE: Apartman luksic
HOME.TEXT: The apartment of the Luksic family is located in the center of the small coastal town of Volosko. Volosko is located by the sea, 1.5 km away from Opatija, and has retained the spirit of an old fishing village, with numerous restaurants, cafes and art galleries. Steep and narrow streets lead to the picturesque port along which the promenade  runs.
